sourcesContent:
<script>

import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
  name:'SplineChart',
  extends: Line,
data() {
  return {
    data: {
      labels: ['January', 'February', 'March'],
      datasets: [{ data: [40, 20, 12] }]
    },
    options: {
      responsive: true
    },
    responsive: true,
     maintainAspectRatio: false
  }
}
}
</script>
